Hello Parent_B—thank you for reaching out. I’m happy to share an overview of Nursery_E.

Daily schedule (typical):
- Arrival & settling-in: calm routines, greeting, choice activities
- Morning circle: songs, stories, sharing, planning the day
- Learning-through-play blocks: guided centers (language, early numeracy, sensory, art, building, role-play)
- Outdoor time: gross-motor play daily (weather permitting)
- Lunch & rest/quiet time

- Play-based with purposeful adult guidance—children choose, explore, and we extend learning with prompts and small-group activities.

Drop-off / pick-up flexibility:

Social-emotional support:
- Consistent key-person approach so your child has a trusted adult.
- We explicitly teach emotion naming, turn-taking, and problem-solving using stories, role-play, and coached peer interactions.
- Positive guidance: clear expectations, calm boundaries, and restorative conversations after conflicts.

To help me give the most relevant details: how old is your child, and what matters most to your family (e.g., longer outdoor time, structured early learning, gentle transitions, flexibility for commuting)? If you’d like, we can also arrange a short visit or call this week.
